name: Spectral Force
overview: The first Spectral Force game for Playstation was released on 1997 and it features battles of groups of 1000 vs. 1000 & 40 countries in the world of Never Land to select the aim of unification. This is the story which became to be called Never Land Great War later. A hero knocked the Devil down just as a legend. After the Devil had died, a country was splited and people begin to fight.
